definitions.definition: A contiguous area of land, smaller than a continent, totally surrounded by water.
An entity surrounded by other entities that are very different from itself.
definitions.example: an island of colors on a butterfly's wing

definitions.definition: A superstructure on an aircraft carrier's deck.

definitions.example: the island in the middle of a roundabout

definitions.definition: An unincorporated area wholly surrounded by one or more incorporated areas.
(grammar) A phrase from which a wh-word cannot be extracted without yielding invalid grammar.
To surround with water; make into an island.
To set, dot (as if) with islands.
